nodes.text: "Evil Arisen" is a roleplaying game adventure seed for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition from West End Games. The scenario was written by Peter M. Schweighofer for the book Tales of the Jedi Companion, published in 1996.

The scenario sends a group of Jedi Knights to investigate the activities of a group of offworlders who recently arrived on the planet Muzara and questioned the inhabitants—native Muza and Human Brentaal League settlers— about the ruins of Kabus-Dabeh. The Jedi follow the strangers into the ruins, where they track them into a well and the cavern into which it feeds. They discover that the strangers are Dark Jedi and followers of the ways of the Sith and stop them before they can retrieve a Sith artifact and bring evil to the Muzara system.
